Title: Time Zone Reference
Details: Quiclky view the current times in 8 cities plus your local timezone to help coordinate global meetings or family catchups.

Title: Patents Granted Transitions
Details: Experimenting with transitions between polygons on a heatmap, circles on a bubble map and rectangles on a bar chart to maintain context while switching between chart.

Title: Time Zone Data Prep
Details: Prepareing the data for the Time Zone Reference app using JavaScript.

Details: Start of a toolkit to be used by other notebooks. Future enhancements will include search, dropdown, hierarchy, multiple select and a value spark bar.

Details: Simple Python script for fetching data from Google Patents Public Data using BigQuery.

Title: Qlik Sense Tab Navigation Extension
Details: Extension for an early Qlik Sense releases.
